text: Gumazamiziba me datɨrɨghɨn fo, atrivim men akam bareghan kogham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me pamtemɨn dɨa kamaghɨn mɨgei, “E Devitɨn adarazir apengan ikian aghua. E Devitɨn adarazi puvatɨ, e uaghan Devitɨn otarir kamɨn adarazi puvatɨ. E Israelɨn gumazamiziba bar uamategh uan nguibabar mangam. Eghtɨ ia Devitɨn adarasi, ia uarira uarir gan.” Me akar kam mɨkemegha, me tintinibar uan nguibabar ghue.
